mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_pal_stnd.select */ SELECT pal_cd /* pal_cd 신체활동수준_코드 character varying(20) */ ,pal_nm /* pal_nm 신체활동수준_명 character varying(30) */ ,pal_val_fr /* pal_val_fr 신체활동수준_값_FROM numeric */ ,pal_val_to /* pal_val_to 신체활동수준_값_TO numeric */ ,pal_eat_rmrk /* pal_eat_rmrk 신체활동수준_섭취_비고 character varying(4000) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ti_pal_stnd WHERE 1 = 1 AND pal_cd = #{palCd} /* pal_cd 신체활동수준_코드 character varying(20) */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_pal_stnd.insert */ INSERT INTO ti_pal_stnd ( pal_cd /* pal_cd 신체활동수준_코드 character varying(20) */
,pal_nm /* pal_nm 신체활동수준_명 character varying(30) */
,pal_val_fr /* pal_val_fr 신체활동수준_값_FROM numeric */ ,pal_val_to /* pal_val_to 신체활동수준_값_TO numeric */
,pal_eat_rmrk /* pal_eat_rmrk 신체활동수준_섭취_비고 character varying(4000) */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{palCd} /* pal_cd 신체활동수준_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{palNm} /* pal_nm 신체활동수준_명 character varying(30) */
,#{palValFr} /* pal_val_fr 신체활동수준_값_FROM numeric */ ,#{palValTo} /* pal_val_to 신체활동수준_값_TO numeric */
,#{palEatRmrk} /* pal_eat_rmrk 신체활동수준_섭취_비고 character varying(4000) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
)
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_pal_stnd.update */ UPDATE ti_pal_stnd
,pal_nm = #{palNm} /* pal_nm 신체활동수준_명 character varying(30) */
,pal_val_fr = #{palValFr} /* pal_val_fr 신체활동수준_값_FROM numeric */
,pal_val_to = #{palValTo} /* pal_val_to 신체활동수준_값_TO numeric */
,pal_eat_rmrk = #{palEatRmrk} /* pal_eat_rmrk 신체활동수준_섭취_비고 character varying(4000) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND pal_cd = #{palCd} /* pal_cd 신체활동수준_코드 character varying(20) */

/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_pal_stnd.merge */ INSERT INTO ti_pal_stnd ( pal_cd /* pal_cd 신체활동수준_코드 character varying(20) */
,pal_nm /* pal_nm 신체활동수준_명 character varying(30) */
,pal_val_fr /* pal_val_fr 신체활동수준_값_FROM numeric */ ,pal_val_to /* pal_val_to 신체활동수준_값_TO numeric */
,pal_eat_rmrk /* pal_eat_rmrk 신체활동수준_섭취_비고 character varying(4000) */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{palCd} /* pal_cd 신체활동수준_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{palNm} /* pal_nm 신체활동수준_명 character varying(30) */
,#{palValFr} /* pal_val_fr 신체활동수준_값_FROM numeric */ ,#{palValTo} /* pal_val_to 신체활동수준_값_TO numeric */
,#{palEatRmrk} /* pal_eat_rmrk 신체활동수준_섭취_비고 character varying(4000) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE
,pal_nm = #{palNm} /* pal_nm 신체활동수준_명 character varying(30) */
,pal_val_fr = #{palValFr} /* pal_val_fr 신체활동수준_값_FROM numeric */
,pal_val_to = #{palValTo} /* pal_val_to 신체활동수준_값_TO numeric */
,pal_eat_rmrk = #{palEatRmrk} /* pal_eat_rmrk 신체활동수준_섭취_비고 character varying(4000) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
mapper.delete: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_pal_stnd.delete */ DELETE FROM ti_pal_stnd WHERE 1 = 1 AND pal_cd = #{palCd} /* pal_cd 신체활동수준_코드 character varying(20) */
